projectiles

Class Projectile

  • java.lang.Object
    • projectiles.Projectile
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Bullet, Cannonball, DynamiteProjectile, Explosion, FireProjectile, Fist, Gunpowder, Kunai, LaserBeam, LightningProjectile, MovingSword, Nuke, Orbital, Pellet, PoisonDart, RingOfFire, Shuriken, Smoke, SniperBullet, Sonic, Sword, Whip, WreckingBall

    public abstract class Projectile
extends java.lang.Object

    • Constructor Detail

      • Projectile

        public Projectile(float xCoor,
                  float yCoor,
                  int direction,
                  int size,
                  boolean impact,
                  int lifespan)
        Parent Class for Projectile Creation
        Parameters:
        xCoor - The starting x-Coordinate for the projectile
        yCoor - The starting y-Coordinate for the projectile
        direction - The cardinal direction of the projectile
        width - The distance of the rectangle's x-plane
        height - The distance of the rectangle's y-plane
        impact - Whether or not the projectile's effects are active immediately
        lifespan - The duration in which the projectile exists after impact
